title: v1.6.3.7-v9 Documentation Update
details:
Updated documentation from v1.6.3.7-v8 to v1.6.3.7-v9 with 11 new fixes:

Key v9 Features:
1. Unified Keepalive - Single 20s interval with correlation IDs
2. Unified Logging - MESSAGE_RECEIVED format with [PORT], [BC], [RUNTIME] prefixes
3. Unified Deduplication - saveId-based dedup
4. Port Age Management - 90s max age, 30s stale timeout
5. Storage Race Cooldown - 200ms cooldown
6. Storage Ordering - sequenceId with event ordering validation
7. BC Sequence Tracking - sequenceNumber with gap detection
8. Storage Integrity - Write validation with sync backup
9. Port Message Ordering - messageSequence with reorder buffer
10. Tab Affinity Cleanup - 24h TTL with browser.tabs.onRemoved
11. Initialization Barrier - initializationStarted/initializationComplete flags

Files Updated:
- .github/copilot-instructions.md
- .github/agents/copilot-docs-updater.md
- .github/agents/quicktabs-unified-agent.md
- .github/agents/quicktabs-cross-tab-agent.md
- .github/agents/quicktabs-manager-agent.md
- .github/agents/bug-fixer.md
- .github/agents/bug-architect.md
- .github/agents/feature-builder.md
- .github/agents/master-orchestrator.md
- README.md
